sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import { useTheme } from '@material-ui/core' import Accordion from '@material-ui/core/Accordion' import AccordionSummary from '@material-ui/core/AccordionSummary' import AccordionDetails from '@material-ui/core/AccordionDetails' import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography' import ExpandMoreIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ExpandMore' const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({})) const QnA = props => { const classes = useStyles() const theme = useTheme() const [expanded, setExpanded] = useState(false) const handleChange = panel => (event, isExpanded) => { setExpanded(isExpanded ? panel : false) } return ( <> } aria-controls='panel1a-content' id='panel1a-header' > Where does all this FUN happenes? We will be glad to arrive at your place for consulation and location impression. Together we'll decide if the activity will be at your place or at one of our designated studios across town. } aria-controls='panel2a-content' id='panel2a-header' > What is the price for all this FUN? Our prices changed according to the group size, type of event and the location. You're welcome to contact us for a quote, or{' '} estimate the price using our calculator. } aria-controls='panel2a-content' id='panel2a-header' > What if not all of our group is into VR? All is good, not everyone must transform into another world. We can offer activities combining human interaction, use of computer/tv screens or trough a mobile app. } aria-controls='panel2a-content' id='panel2a-header' > What kind of technology are you using? We arrive at your place with Oculus Quest goggels, by Facebook. One of the most advanced VR hadset in the market, which allows 4K experience without the need of cables or heavy equipment. ) } export default QnA
